Function Documentation

pw13_data pw13_data_array (  unsigned int  nblocks  ) 
 

Allocate an array of blocks.

The first block contains the blocks count, and is followed by the counted blocks.

PW13_EXPORT pw13_data pw13_data_array_init (  unsigned int  nblocks,
... 
) 
 

Allocate and initialize an array of blocks.

The first block contains the blocks count, and is followed by the counted blocks.

pw13_data pw13_data_block (   ) 
 

Allocate two blocks.

The first contains 1 in nblocks because there is a single data block in the data segment. The second block contains user data.

pw13_data pw13_data_copy (  pw13_data  d  ) 
 

Copy a data segment.

void pw13_data_free (  pw13_data  d  ) 
 

Free a data segment.

unsigned int pw13_data_size (  pw13_data  d  ) 
 

Returns the size in bytes of a data segment.

pw13_data pw13_data_zero (   ) 
 

Allocate a single data block containing zero.

That means that the data segment contains no data.

Allocate a new data type.
